fragment_calculate_activity_tracking.xml Calculation of activity (in minutes) Per month: Last month (
activity tracking help menu dialog
Author: HUAMING CAI\n\nVersion Number: 1.0.0\n\nThis is an Activity Tracking. In the bottom tool bar of this interface, there are four buttons to operate this activity tracking. From left to right, the first button is designed to add a new activity tracking. The second button is used to list all activity tracking. User can select one of them to edit or delete it. These activity tracking can also be sorted by clicking "SORT BY TIME" button and summarized daily by clicking "DAILY SUMMARY" button. The third button is used to calculate minutes of activity the user does per month and last month. The fourth button is for help information.\n\nThe second language is Simplified Chinese.\n\nOn the top tool bar, three buttons are used to bring a user to other three activities.
Close>
